verses.roman:
tabe sārvabhauma prabhura dakṣiṇa-pārśve vasi'
milāite lāgilā saba puruṣottama-vāsī

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dakṣiṇa-pārśve—by the right side; vasi'—sitting; milāite—to introduce; lāgilā—began; saba—all; puruṣottama-vāsī—residents of Puruṣottama (Jagannātha Purī).
translation: After this, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, sitting at the right hand of the Lord, began to introduce all the inhabitants of Puruṣottama, Jagannātha Purī.
